longCorner.name: longCorner
description: The four bodies of the other counter-terrorist operatives are strewn around the area alongside two terrorist corpses. Blood spatters the dusty ground and walls and pistols litter the area.
A terrorist, bandanas masking his entire face, stands near the doors, a pistol levelled at my head.

commands.command: i run down the street to the north
commands.description: I run down the street to the north.

commands.command: both hit him in the head
commands.description: Both hit him in the head.

commands.command: blood splashes back against the wall
commands.description: Blood splashes back against the wall.

commands.command: he drops lifeless to the ground
commands.description: He drops lifeless to the ground.

description: The four bodies of the other counter-terrorist operatives are strewn around the area alongside three terrorist corpses. Blood spatters the dusty ground and walls and pistols litter the area.
The terrorist I killed lies flat on his back, eyes seeing nothing.

commands.command: i run down the street to the north
commands.description: I run down the street to the north
